name: Surf or Die
description:
Surf or Die

"Every man dies, not every man really lives." Surf or Die is your chance to live and feel truly alive!

Surf or Die is the ultimate surfing game! Surf the planet at 19 world class surfing locations and unlock new boards and new moves as you proceed through the game. Perform dozens of tricks and paddle out into monster waves like never before. Feel like you are one with nature as you harness the power of the waves.

Surf the following breaks:
- Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
- Blacks Beach, San Diego
- Gas Chambers, Puerto Rico
- Hebara Beach, Chiba, Japan
- Dungeons, Cape Town, South Africa
- Bidart Plage, Biarritz, France
- Sebastian Inlet, Florida
- Crantok, Cornwall, England
- Praia do Campeche, Brazil
- Commonwealth Bay, Antartica
- Bells Beach, Victoria, Australia
- Banzai Pipeline, Oahu, Hawaii
- Grajagan(G-Land), Indonesia
- Indicators, Raglan, New Zealand
- Santa Teresa, Costa Rica
- Superbank, Gold Coast, Australia
- Mavericks, Northern California
- Teahupoo, Tahiti
- Peahi(Jaws), Maui, Hawaii

Surf or Die Features:
- Advanced OpenGL graphics
- Music and sound effects
- Different camera angles
- Online high score database
- High-resolution textures
- Made for all iOS devices.

Surf or Die is brought to you by the makers of World Winter Games, iRollerCoaster, and iBASEjump.

Have fun with Surf or Die and feel alive!
